summary: A series of adventures begins when an accident during photographing causes Buster to be mistaken for Dead Shot Dan, the evil badguy.
cast: Buster Keaton|Virginia Fox|Joe Roberts|Malcolm St. Clair|Kitty Bradbury|Edward F. Cline|Jean C. Havez|Joe Keaton|Louise Keaton|Myra Keaton
director: Directors: Buster Keaton, Malcolm St. Clair (as Mal. St. Clair)
title: El chivo
